name: Fruit Ninja Animate
description: you're the Ninja in the bottom of the screen move your mouse to aim at the fruit the left click is to shoot shuriken at the fruit but not the bombs if shoot at the bombs you'll lose your live if you shoot more bombs? you'll lose all your lives and the game is over be careful not to try to shoot at the bombs well the fruit gives you points good luck so make sure you can save your high score
